title: How to get permanent 500 subscribers on a YouTube channel - Quora

response.answer_text: Thanks for the A2A To get 500, or for that matter, any number of subscribers, you need a good channel niche, good quality content and consistent upload. Remember one thing - Individual subscribers are never permanent. They may unsubscribe any time. The thing which matters is that the total number of subscribers should not become less over time. You need to ensure that the number of subscribers gained is more than the number of subscribers lost. Forget all these things. Concentrate on only one thing and that is how to create good quality and interesting content. Subscribers will automatically follow.

Here are some tips Stick to one nicheKeep uploading on a daily basisSuppor your fansNever keep your video boringKeep a track of the trending videosIf you stick to these points, then you will not only get 500, you can get even more.
